message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.CE, cs.HC

Reasoning: The paper discusses approaches to improve peer assessment using natural language processing, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). It also discusses auto-grading and peer assessment tools, which are related to machine learning (cs.LG) and cybernetics (cs.CY). The strategies to handle rogue reviews may fall under the category of computer engineering (cs.CE) and the peer review improvement may fall under human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
